head.supplied: 9/10/83 ¶ ¶ I believed, dear Mr Tepper, I have remarked to you previously that I am sending algae for naming to the grand master of algal study, Professor Agardh, whenever such are not immediately re...

div.p: RB MSS M198, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: Ich glaubte, lieber Herr Tepper, Ihnen früher bemerkt zu haben, dass ich Algen zum Benennen an den Grossmeister der Algenkunde, Hr Prof Agardh sende, wenn immer solche sich nicht gleich erkennen lassen, so auch Ihre.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p: I believed, dear Mr Tepper, I have remarked to you previously that I am sending algae for naming to the grand master of algal study, Professor Agardh, whenever such are not immediately recognisable, so also with yours.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
